pisces.d

Class FPMath

  • java.lang.Object
    • pisces.d.FPMath
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Constants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AxisAngle, FXMath, Matrix, Tuple

    public abstract class FPMath
extends java.lang.Object
implements Constants
    Floating point

    Epsilon scalar radii

    Because floating point numeric values are not uniformly distributed on the real number domain 
     V = s * 1.f * 2**(e*-127)
    for sign 's', exponent 'e' and fraction 'f', rounding error checks must be scaled to the range of the value under test.
